What's the scenario here?  Is this reproducible in WTP?  That message is an expected message on an EAR with no modules.  Perhaps you should be disabling schema validation?

I'm resolving this bug...


This looks like a headless environment, where the EMF2DOMRenderer is used, and schema validation is turned on

traces.message: cvc-complex-type.2.4.b: The content of element 'application' is not complete. One of '{"http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/j2ee":display-name, "http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/j2ee":icon, "http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/j2ee":module}' is expected.
